title.rendered: Fundbox Makes The Forbes Billion-Dollar Startup List For 2017

content.rendered:
This week Fundbox was recognized by Forbes as one of the Next Billion-Dollar Startups to watch in 2017!  And we couldn’t be more excited or proud!

Also, a big kudos goes to our founder and CEO @EyalShinar for being featured in this article “Fundbox’s Big Opportunity In Changing The Way Small Businesses Get Paid“.

We are reminded each that our success is a true reflection of the trust we’ve built with our customers and, that without them we would not exist.   So a giant THANK YOU to all the people that support us including our cherished customers, partners, investors and employees.

We made this list because of all of you!
